Content:
Yamaha R3: 0-60 in 5.2 seconds, 1/4 mile 14.2

How does that compare to some cars I've owned, own?
1979 Datsun 280 ZX(+2) 9.1 / 17.1
1988 Mustang 5.0 GT 7.1 / 15.2
2010 Jeep Wrangler 9.2 / 16.8
2014 Honda Ridgeline 7.8 / 15.9
2015 Mazda Miata 6.9 / 15.3
2021 Mustang Ecoboost convertible (310 HP) stick shift 6.3 / 14*
Automatic hardtop 0-60 is 5.2 seconds, quarter mile 13.5 - the 14 is a guesstimate

The R3 is just a little 300 but its still quicker than any car I've had.
(And no, I've never owned a really quick car.)

Title: It is just a little 300
